title: Nomsmas 2016

media.caption: Full spread of all baked goods.
Snickerdoodles cooling on a baking tray.
Red velvet cookies cooling on a rack.
Peanut butter cookies cooling on a rack.

overview:
100 dozen Christmas treats, in 12 different forms:

  • Chocolate-dipped peanut butter balls
  • Red velvet cookies
  • Chocolate chip cookies
  • Chocolate-dipped chocolate chip shortbreads
  • Snickerdoodles
  • Sugar cutouts
  • Death by chocolate cookies
  • Cocoa cookies
  • Ginger cookies
  • Peanut butter cookies.

Oh, and five pounds of fudge.

A typical holiday weekend's worth of baking.
